data.title: Harold Nicholas Keogh
data.meta_description: Harold Nicholas Keogh is one of the older brothers of the Clerk, Keigan Nicholas Keogh. Harold Nicholas Keogh was born into the Keogh family. data.text:
Harold Nicholas Keogh is one of the older brothers of the Clerk, Keigan Nicholas Keogh.

Compiled Overview[]

Harold Nicholas Keogh was born into the Keogh family. As he grew up, he was able to attend a prestigious school and become a lawyer.[1] At some point, he met Betsy from the Mesmer family. The two got married, with Betsy later becoming pregnant with his son.[2] At some point, Harold’s younger sister, Keigan, would visit him and help him with legal documentation.

During his law career, Harold would accept a monetary bribe from his father-in-law in exchange for an innocent verdict on an upcoming law case against him. His wife would discover the documentation of this exchange and would alert Keigan to it.[3] Keigan, angered at her brother’s disregard for a proper trial, would take matters into her own hands and slowly begin poisoning his food. As a result, his health would deteriorate and he would begin to rely on Keigan more and more, leading to her taking his place as a judge.
